items.sentence: You don\'t need to be afraid of making mistakes.
Tom only eats with his family about once a week.
Tom opened a desk drawer and pulled out a flask.
Tom opened the envelope and took out the letter.
I suspect Tom is still in love with his ex-wife.
I suspect that Tom can do that without any help.
I suspect that Tom will come to Boston by plane.
The band that\'s playing tonight is from Boston.
Tom does do some goofy things from time to time.
Tom scribbled down some details in his notebook.
Tom seems to be afraid of just about everything.
Tom seems to be angry, but not as angry as Mary.
Tom took off his coat and hung it in the closet.
Tom took pictures of all the animals at the zoo.
Tom tried to persuade Mary to come to his party.
Tom turned off his alarm and went back to sleep.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom had moved to Australia.
Tom certainly didn\'t expect anything like this.
Didn\'t you know Tom had a house on Park Street?
Didn\'t you know Tom had relatives in Australia?
